Prerequisites: ACG 2021 AND MAC 1105 (COLLEGE ALGEBRA) OR EQUIVALENTS EACH WITH A GRADE OF "C" OR BETTER.
Course Description:
PREREQUISITE:ACG 2021 AND MAC 1105 (COLLEGE ALGEBRA) OR EQUIVALENTS EACH WITH A GRADE OF "C" OR BETTER.
CONCEPTUAL INTRODUCTION TO MANAGERIAL ACCOUNTING. ACCOUNTING FOR COST REPORTING AND CONTROL. REPORTS, STATEMENTS, AND ANALYTICAL TOOLS USED BY MANAGEMENT.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
